0.3.name: wordpress/filter-post-formats
0.3.description:
I wanted to move my image post formats away from my homepage and to another section of my website, so I created this plugin.
This plugin will filter out post formats on your home pagebut leave the archive pages and search results alone.

Additionally, I created a drop-down within the edit-posts section of the administrator page to enable the user to filter the post by post format.
